modules.name: Gig Bus Mixer
modules.description: Stereo mixer to three stereo buses

modules.name: Mini Bus Mixer
modules.description: Mono mixer to three stereo buses

modules.name: School Bus Mixer
modules.description: Pan and levels with CVs to three stereo buses

modules.name: Metro City Bus Mixer
modules.description: Polyphonic stereo spread (and pan follow) to three stereo buses

modules.name: Bus Depot
modules.description: Master fader, vu meters, or mix output for three stereo buses

modules.name: Bus Route
modules.description: Three stereo sends and returns with optional sample delays

modules.name: Road
modules.description: Merge stereo buses from mixers or mix groups

modules.name: Enter Mixer Bus
modules.description: Three stereo inputs to three stereo buses

modules.name: Exit Mixer Bus
modules.description: Three stereo outputs from three stereo buses
